display_title.display_title:
Korea - Waste Disposal Project :
            environmental impact assessment and modification plan for
            Janglim Sewage Treatment Plant Construction Project (Vol. 2)

Korea - Waste Disposal Project :
            environmental impact assessment and modification plan for
            Janglim Sewage Treatment Plant Construction Project

Korea - Waste Disposal Project :
            environmental impact assessment and modification plan for
            Janglim Sewage Treatment Plant Construction Project

subtopic: Country Strategy & Performance,Energy and Environment,Sustainable Land and Crop Management,Information Technology,General Technology
admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Waste Disposal Project seeks to
            address environmental concerns regarding wastewater and
            specified waste disposal in Pusan City and Chunbuk Province.
            This report consists mainly of the environmental impact
            assessment for i) the Pusan City Janglim Sewage Treatment
            Plant; and ii) the Specified Wastes Incineration Plant in
            Chunbuk Province. To mitigate the impact of air pollution
            during construction, dust will be reduced by paving road
            surfaces, spraying water, and controlling the speed limit of
            vehicles. Sludge generated during operation will be burnt.
            Sewage and waste water will be treated on the project sites
            to meet the requirement of water quality. The impact of
            noise pollution will be mitigated by controlling night work
            during construction. Sound-proof equipment will be used to
            reduce noise level during operation. Odor generated by the
            wastes will be mitigated by isolating the location of the
            storage facility and by cleaning it periodically. Trucks for
            waste transportation will be covered. Gas generated from the
            land fill will be collected and incinerated.
